entry.source: I require {F804,5}3{F804,0} {F804,5}{F872,1}s{F804,0} immediately.{F801}Our food supply is starting to run low.{F801}Our only option is to hunt demons and live{F801}off their meat. I believe you can find some{F801}{F872,1}s in the {F804,5}aboveground{F804,0} areas near{F801}{F804,5}Shinjuku.{F804,0} I wish you the best of luck.{F801}
